segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this scene in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so diligently drying dishes, unaware of the trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might slip and get hurt any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the unsteady stool, stretching so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall and it could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, hand raised for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this mischief could lead to tears and injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts with this potential sorrow inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for them all, caught in this unaware moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't things just stay calm and safe?
segments.speaker: PAR
